subtopics.name: Arithmetic Operators
subtopics.description: Using operators like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division to perform calculations.

subtopics.name: Comparison Operators
subtopics.description: Comparing values using operators such as equal to, not equal to, greater than, and less than.

subtopics.name: Logical Operators
subtopics.description: Combining multiple conditions using logical operators like and, or, and not.

subtopics.name: Assignment Operators
subtopics.description: Assigning values to variables using operators like +=, -=, *=, and /=.

subtopics.name: If Statements
subtopics.description: Executing code blocks based on specific conditions using if statements.

subtopics.name: Elif and Else
subtopics.description: Handling multiple conditions and default cases with elif and else clauses.

subtopics.name: For Loops
subtopics.description: Repeating actions for a fixed number of iterations using for loops.

subtopics.name: While Loops
subtopics.description: Continuously executing code as long as a condition remains true using while loops.

subtopics.name: Nested Loops
subtopics.description: Using loops within loops to handle more complex iteration scenarios.

subtopics.name: Loop Control Statements (break, continue, pass)
subtopics.description: Controlling the flow of loops with statements like break, continue, and pass.

subtopics.name: Deeply Nested Control Structures
subtopics.description: Creating complex control structures with multiple levels of nesting for intricate logic.

subtopics.name: Defining Functions
subtopics.description: Creating reusable blocks of code using the def keyword to define functions.

subtopics.name: Function Arguments
subtopics.description: Passing values to functions through parameters and arguments.

subtopics.name: Return Values
subtopics.description: Returning results from functions using the return statement.

subtopics.name: Lambda Functions
subtopics.description: Creating small anonymous functions using the lambda keyword.

subtopics.name: Scope and Lifetime
subtopics.description: Understanding variable scope and the lifetime of variables within functions.

subtopics.name: Lists
subtopics.description: Creating and managing ordered collections of items using lists.

subtopics.name: Tuples
subtopics.description: Using immutable ordered collections of items with tuples.

subtopics.name: Dictionaries
subtopics.description: Storing key-value pairs in dictionaries for efficient data retrieval.

subtopics.name: Sets
subtopics.description: Managing unordered collections of unique items with sets.

subtopics.name: List Comprehensions
subtopics.description: Creating lists efficiently using concise syntax with list comprehensions.

subtopics.name: Dictionary Comprehensions
subtopics.description: Generating dictionaries in a compact form using dictionary comprehensions.

subtopics.name: Nested Data Structures
subtopics.description: Understanding and manipulating multi-tiered data types (e.g. lists of lists) for advanced data modeling.

subtopics.name: Importing Modules
subtopics.description: Using import statements to include external modules in your Python programs.

subtopics.name: Standard Library Overview
subtopics.description: Exploring Python's built-in modules that provide a wide range of functionalities.

subtopics.name: Classes and Objects
subtopics.description: Creating classes to define objects with attributes and methods.

subtopics.name: Attributes and Methods
subtopics.description: Defining and using attributes (variables) and methods (functions) within classes.

subtopics.name: Inheritance
subtopics.description: Creating new classes based on existing ones to promote code reuse.

subtopics.name: Encapsulation
subtopics.description: Restricting access to certain components of objects to protect data integrity.

subtopics.name: Polymorphism
subtopics.description: Allowing objects of different classes to be treated as objects of a common superclass.

subtopics.name: Magic Methods
subtopics.description: Implementing special methods to define how objects behave with built-in functions and operators.

subtopics.name: NumPy Basics
subtopics.description: Using NumPy for numerical operations and handling large, multi-dimensional arrays.

subtopics.name: Pandas Basics
subtopics.description: Leveraging Pandas for data manipulation and analysis with dataframes.

subtopics.name: Matplotlib for Data Visualization
subtopics.description: Creating visual representations of data using the Matplotlib library.

subtopics.name: Requests for HTTP Operations
subtopics.description: Making HTTP requests to interact with web services and APIs using the Requests library.

subtopics.name: Random Library
subtopics.description: Utilizing Python's random module for generating random numbers and performing probabilistic simulations.

subtopics.name: Turtle Graphics
subtopics.description: Creating drawings and simple animations using Python's turtle module.

subtopics.name: Pygame for Game Development
subtopics.description: Developing interactive games and multimedia applications using the pygame library.
